testimonials.text: Thanks to the scholarship, I was able to pursue my dreams without financial worry.
testimonials.caption: Maria Santos, Computer Science Graduate

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.content: Ang Katambayung Foundation provides access to postsecondary education for students who demonstrate financial need, academic merit, and a commitment to community service. Higher education as a catalyst for positive change, ensuring equity in educational opportunities regardless of economic circumstance.

about.title: About Us
about.content: Ang Katambayayung Foundation is committed to empowering communities through various programs and initiatives.

history.title: History
history.content: Founded in [year], Ang Katambayung Foundation has been dedicated to supporting education and community development for over [X] years.

student-stories.title: Student Stories
student-stories.content: Read inspiring stories from students who have benefited from our programs and scholarships.

board.title: Board of Directors
board.content: Our volunteer board provides leadership and governance for the foundation.

staff.title: Staff
staff.content: Meet our dedicated team working to make a difference in education and community support.

policy-fellows.title: Policy Fellows
policy-fellows.content: Our policy fellowship program involves students in advocacy, designing a policy agenda, working with lawmakers, research, and equity work.

partners.title: Partners
partners.content: We collaborate with various organizations and institutions to expand our impact.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: Get in touch with us for more information about our programs and how to get involved.
